titleStmt.title: A letter and declaration of the nobility and gentry of the county of York. To his excellency, the Lord Generall Monck.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: The "declaration" bears the names of Tho. Lord Fairfax and others.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
